about_the_game:
Experience the next evolution of forklift simulation with the Year 2025 Update—a free DLC for Forklift 2024 - The Simulation!

This update takes your simulation experience to the next level with a variety of exciting enhancements:

📦 Improved Forklift Controls
Feel the difference with refined controls for smoother, more realistic handling. Master every maneuver with precision like never before!

📦 Enhanced Light and Shadow Rendering
Immerse yourself in a world of stunning visuals with upgraded lighting and shadows, bringing your warehouse adventures to life in breathtaking detail.

📦 New Location: Harbor
Expand your horizons with the addition of a brand-new Harbor location! Navigate narrow docks and tackle fresh challenges in this bustling coastal setting.

📦 Overall Visual Quality Improvements
From detailed environments to polished textures, enjoy a more vibrant and dynamic simulation with upgraded graphics across the board.

Get ready to dive into the ultimate forklift simulation experience—bigger, better, and more immersive than ever!

The Year 2025 Update is free for all owners of Forklift 2024 - The Simulation. Download it in and start lifting in style!
